meanings.definition: Make or become aware or responsive to something.
meanings.sent1: She is slowly attuning herself to the sounds of nature.
meanings.sent2: The musician spent hours attuning his guitar before the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be attuning itself to the presence of the new puppy.
meanings.sent4: His mind was attuning to the rhythm of the waves crashing on the shore.
meanings.sent5: Attuning to the subtle changes in the environment helped her predict the weather.

meanings.sent1: He is attuning the radio to find his favorite station.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic is attuning the engine for better performance.
meanings.sent3: The robot was attuning its movements to mimic human gestures.
meanings.sent4: She was attuning her schedule to accommodate the new project.
meanings.sent5: Attuning the telescope allowed him to see the stars more clearly.
